import axios from"../axios";var getListProducts=function getListProducts(){return axios.get("/api/getListProducts");};var getProductById=function getProductById(id){return axios.get("/api/getProductById?id=".concat(id));};var getAllProductsByIdCategory=function getAllProductsByIdCategory(id){return axios.get("/api/getAllProductsByIdCategory?id=".concat(id));};var getPageCount=function getPageCount(totalItem,limit){return Math.ceil(totalItem/limit);};// get product by keyword
var getProductsByKeyword=function getProductsByKeyword(keyword){return axios.get("/api/getProductsByKeyword?keyword=".concat(keyword));};export{getListProducts,getProductById,getPageCount,getAllProductsByIdCategory,getProductsByKeyword};
